mbuild.formats package¶

Submodules¶

mbuild.formats.gromacs module¶

mbuild.formats.gromacs.save_gromacs(traj, step=-1, basename='mbuild', forcefield='opls-aa')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a GROMACS .gro and .top file.

mbuild.formats.hoomdxml module¶

mbuild.formats.hoomdxml.load_hoomdxml(filename, optional_nodes=True)[source]¶

Load a HOOMD-blue XML file form disk.

TODO: better way to read optional nodes :param filename: Path to xml file. :type filename: str

Returns:traj
Return type:md.Trajectory
mbuild.formats.hoomdxml.save_hoomdxml(traj, step=-1, optional_nodes=None, filename='mbuild.xml')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a HOOMD XML file.

Parameters:
  • traj (md.Trajectory) – The Trajectory to be output.
  • filename (str, optional) – Path of the output file.

mbuild.formats.lammps module¶

mbuild.formats.lammps.save_lammps(traj, step=-1, filename='data.mbuild', unit_set='real')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a LAMMPS data file.

Parameters:
  • traj (Trajectory) – The Trajectory to be output.
  • step (int, optional) – The frame in traj to save. Default is last frame.
  • filename (str, optional) – Path of the output file.
  • unit_set (str, optional) – The LAMMPS unit set to write the data file in.

mbuild.formats.mol2 module¶

mbuild.formats.mol2.save_mol2(traj, step=-1, filename='mbuild.mol2')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a TRIPOS mol2 file.

Parameters:
  • traj (md.Trajectory) – The Trajectory to be output.
  • filename (str, optional) – Path of the output file.
